Arrows.description: Directional and movement-related symbols including arrows, corners, skips, drops, expand/contract indicators, and motion cues.

Buildings.description: Structures and places including homes, public buildings, institutions, shops, and architectural landmarks.

Business.description: Business, communication, productivity, analytics, organizational tools, legal marks, and corporate utilities.

Communication.description: Messaging, chats, conversation tools, speech, AI-enhanced communication, and feedback interactions.

Design.description: Design, drawing, editing, creative tools, geometry, layout, shapes, and transformation utilities.

Development.description: Developer tools, coding, debugging, Git operations, languages, terminals, and runtime environments.

Devices.description: Physical and digital devices including computers, phones, peripherals, storage, networking, sensors, and connectivity indicators.

Document.description: Files, folders, notes, books, formats, records, archives, document actions, metadata, status indicators, and content types.

Editor.description: Text editing, formatting, typography, alignment, lists, tables, quotes, code blocks, transforms, math, translation tools, AI editing actions, and document structuring utilities.

Finance.description: Money, payments, wallets, shopping, currency symbols, exchange operations, crypto, value representation, deals, discounts, and financial instruments.

Food.description: Food, beverages, utensils, desserts, drinks, and restaurant-related items.

Game & Sports.description: Sports equipment, games, musical play items, dice, poker suits, and competitive activity symbols.

Health.description: Health, medical care, wellness, biology, diagnostics, first aid, mental health, lab tools, and physiological symbols.

Logos.description: Brand logos, product logos, company identities, open-source ecosystems, social networks, development frameworks, AI labs, cloud services, and major digital platforms.

Map.description: Maps, navigation, locations, directions, transportation, vehicles, travel, logistics, and movement-related symbols.

Media.description: Images, videos, cameras, audio, music, playback controls, notifications, media quality, picture-in-picture, and visual/audio interaction elements.

System.description: System-level controls, UI elements, app management, menus, settings, alerts, validation, uploads/downloads, security, search, timers, filters, loaders, progress indicators, and general utility operations.

User & Faces.description: Users, profiles, identities, emotions, avatars, characters, robots, creatures, social interactions, and user-related actions.

Weather.description: Weather conditions, temperature indicators, atmospheric effects, natural disasters, and environmental phenomena.

Others.description: General-purpose icons representing objects, clothing, nature, tools, household items, security, recognition, environment, and miscellaneous utilities.
